ygData.authorName: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4
ygData.from: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Dispelling...
ygData.msgSnippet: The problem with using our Cancel Magic song to remove spell effects is that it checks against your MR.  I think, but am not 100% certain, that Cancel Magic
ygData.messageBody:
The problem with using our Cancel Magic song to remove spell effects is that
it checks against your MR. I think, but am not 100% certain, that Cancel
Magic will always remove the first spell effect. So if you are rooted, in
order to get rid of it the root icon needs to be listed first. Then the
song has to actually succeed a MR check. When I want to remove my DE
illusion, I usually have to try 2-3 times before the song sticks.

Using Disenchanting Melody to remove root would work OK IF you didn't have
any other positive buffs. It could easily remove one of your cleric buffs
instead of the root.

Galtin

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 11, 2001 10:44 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dispelling...


What i was pondering is :

Were we able to remove buffs on ourselves before? except for DE illusion
which i know we can

-----Original Message-----
From: Windleaf Mistsong [mailto:windleaf@...]
Sent: January 11, 2001 3:24 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com; 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dispelling...


I know Syvelian's Anti-Magic Aura works on removing Damage Shields and
other buffs on mobs as I used it last night in Sol A.

I'm assuming you're trying to strip your own enchantments with Alenia's
Disenchanting Melody. I know this used to clear my dark elf illusion.

I just logged on and tested it and it worked fine. Did my inkie illusion,
then started up Alenia's Disenchanting Melody and it cleared it.

---Windleaf

At 09:41 AM 1/11/01 -0500, Cyr, Thierry wrote:
>after the patch other day i tried to dispell clarity on me and couldnt..
>(damn chanters sometimes)
>
>Now in the past the only thing i used to dispel on myself was dark elf
>illusion... Were we able to dispell our buffs in the past with our song?
>or has this changed since last patch? I could not dispell clarity, i tried
>multiple times, morphed into DE form, was able to dispell that.
>
>Just curious
>
>Minkin
